nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If NextToken is returned, there are more results available. The value of NextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Make the call again using the returned token to retrieve the next page.

nested_items.name: DefaultAction
nested_items.description: Default action instructs the traï¬c policy to either Allow or Deny (block) messages that fall outside of (or not addressed by) the conditions of your policy statements.

nested_items.name: TrafficPolicyId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the traffic policy resource.

nested_items.name: TrafficPolicyName
nested_items.description: A user-friendly name of the traffic policy resource.
